hizbs.text: Ebam iha'o ye, amara sasti'i yantranadayaka sasti.
Apani taderake ibrahimera mehamanadera abastha suniye dina.
Yakhana tara tamra grhe agamana karala ebam balalah salama. Tini balalenah amara tomadera byapare bhita.
Tara balalah bhaya karabena na. Amara apanake ekajana jnanabana chele-santanera susambada dicchi.
Tini balalenah tomara ki amake ematabasthaya susambada diccha, yakhana ami bardhakye pauche gechi
Tara balalah amara apanake satya su-sambada dicchi! Ata'eba apani nirasa habena na.
Tini balalenah palanakartara rahamata theke pathabhrastara chara ke nirasa haya
tini balalenah atahpara tomadera pradhana uddesya ki he allahara preritagana
tara balalah amara ekati aparadhi sampradayera prati prerita hayechi.
Kintu lutera paribara-parijana. Amara abasya'i tadera saba'ike bamciye neba.
Tabe tara stri. Amara sthira karechi ye, se theke ya'oyadera dalabhukta habe.
Atahpara yakhana preritara lutera grhe pauchala.
Tini balalenah tomara to aparicita loka.
Tara balalah na baram amara apanara kache ai bastu niye esechi, ye samparke tara bibada karata.
Ebam amara apanara kache satya bisaya niye esechi ebam amara satyabadi.

Ata'eba apani sesaratre paribarera sakalake niye cale yana ebam apani tadera pascadanusarana karabena na ebam apanadera madhye ke'u yena pichana phire na dekhe. Apanara yekhane adesa prapta hacchena sekhane yana.
Ami lutake e bisaya parijnata kare de'i ye, sakala hale'i taderake samule binasa kare deya habe.
Saharabasira ananda-ullasa karate karate pauchala.
Luta balalenah tara amara mehamana. Ata'eba amake lanchita karo na.
Tomara allahake bhaya kara ebam amara iyayata nasta karo na.
Tara balalah amara ki apanake jagatdbasira samarthana karate nisedha karini.
Tini balalenah yadi tomara ekanta kichu karate'i ca'o, tabe amara kan'yara upasthita ache.
Apanara pranera kasama, tara apana nesaya pramatta chila.
Atahpara suryodayera samaya taderake pracanda ekati sabda ese pakara'o karala.
Atahpara ami janapadatike ulte dilama ebam tadera upara kankarera prasthara barsana karalama.
Niscaya ete cintasiladera jan'ye nidarsanabali rayeche.
Janapadati soja pathe abasthita rayeche.
Niscaya ete imanadaradera jan'ye nidarsana ache.
Niscaya gahina banera adhibasira papi chila.
Atahpara ami tadera kacha theke pratisodha niyechi. Ubhaya basti prakasya rastara upara abasthita.
Niscaya hijarera basindara payagambaraganera prati mithyaropa kareche.
Ami taderake nijera nidarsanabali diyechi. Atahpara tara egulo theke mukha phiriye neya.
Tara pahare niscinte ghara khoda'i karata.
Atahpara eka pratyuse tadera upara ekata sabda ese aghata karala.
Takhana kona upakare asala na ya tara uparjana karechila.
Ami nabhomandala, bhumandala ebam etadubhayera madhyabarti ya ache ta tatparyahina srsti karini. Keyamata abasya'i asabe. Ata'eba parama audasin'yera sathe odera kriyakarma upakso karuna.
Niscaya apanara palanakarta'i srasta, sarbajna.
Ami apanake satati bara bara pathitabya ayata ebam mahana kora'ana diyechi.

Apani caksu tule ai bastura prati dekhabena na, ya ami tadera madhye kayeka prakara lokake bhoga karara jan'ye diyechi, tadera jan'ye cintita habena na ara imanadaradera jan'ye sbiya bahu nata karuna.
Ara balunah ami prakasya bhaya pradarsaka.
Yemana ami nayila karechi yara bibhinna mate bibhakta tadera upara.
Yara kora'anake khanda khanda kareche.
Ata'eba apanara palanakartara kasama, ami abasya'i odera saba'ike jijnasabada karaba.
Odera kajakarma samparke.
Ata'eba apani prakasye suniye dina ya apanake adesa kara haya ebam musarikadera para'oya karabena na.
Bidrupakaridera jan'ye ami apanara paksa theke yathesta.
Yara allahara sathe an'ya upasya sabyasta kare. Ata'eba atisattara tara jene nebe.
Ami jani ye apani tadera kathabartaya hatodyama haye parena.
Ata'eba apani palanakartara saundarya smarana karuna ebam sejadakaridera antarbhukta haye yana.
Ebam palanakartara ebadata karuna, ye paryanta apanara kache niscita katha na ase.
